content: @Sandra Vance are there links to material for track leads? I understand I'm supposed to provide an agenda for my track, and want to make sure I do this in the right place.

I see

image.png
... at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021+-+05+Connectathon+27?preview=/104568828/104578376/Connectathon%2027%20Track%20Lead%20Kick%20Off.pptx but I don't know how to "enter"

Please use the Session Capture [https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Connectathon+Session+Capture] from the Connectathon page to enter your sessions as soon as possible. This will include your track kick off call (held between May 4 and May 14) as well as any sessions during the Connectathon.

All session data will be uploaded from Confluence Session Capture to Whova this Thursday, April 15th. After that, you can still add/ change sessions in Confluence but they will have to be manually changed in Whova by HL7 staff. YIKES!

Not sure how? Review slides 5-12 from our March 30 Track Lead Planning Call slide deck [https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021+-+05+Connectathon+27?preview=/104568828/109545895/Connectathon%2027%20Track%20Lead%20Planning%203.30.pptx] If you have reviewed those slides and still have questions let me know.

All of this information can be found on the Track Lead Check List on the Main connectathon 27 page [https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021+-+05+Connectathon+27]

Josh Mandel said:

Maybe it's at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Connectathon+Session+Capture ?

Yep!

Hi I believe there has been a mistake in the transcribing of the agenda on confluence to the whova agenda. In the confluence agenda I made a schedule for the FHIR Mapping track (https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-05+FHIR+Mapping+Language+Track). In the whova agenda I appear to be hosting the Questionnaire track (https://www.hl7.org/events/fhir/connectathon/2021/05/). Can this be changed to the FHIR Mapping Track to avoid confusion?
